info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:34PM MDT until August 05 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN DAY...SOUTHWESTERN MARSHALL AND SOUTHEASTERN BROWN COUNTIES... At 733 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Groton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. At 733 PM half dollar sized hail was reported in Groton. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Andover around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Pierpont and Langford. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
